Breeding male.description: Male Cinnamon Teal have bright cinnamon heads and bodies and lack the white facial crescent on male Blue-winged Teals.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Cinnamon Teals have a warmer-toned and plainer face, whereas Blue-winged Teals have colder, gray tones. Cinnamon Teals also lack the white spot behind the bill that nonbreeding Blue-winged Teals have.

Breeding male.description: Northern Shovelers are larger than Blue-winged Teals and have a white (not brown) breast.

Female/immature.description: Northern Shovelers are larger with a wider bill than Blue-winged Teals. The bill is also orangish (not black).

Breeding male and female (American).description: Green-winged Teals have a bright green speculum and do not show blue in the wings in flight like Blue-winged Teals.

Female/nonbreeding male.description: Female Green-winged Teals are darker brown, with a darker stripe through the eye and a darker cap than Blue-winged Teals. They also lack the white spot behind the bill that Blue-wined Teals have.
